channel.title: Comments on: Please Sign The OGs’ Digital Anniversary Card

item.title: By: Anonymous
item.dc:creator: Anonymous
item.description:
<strong>Congrats!</strong><br />Congratulations lovebirds! You've got it all; love, youth, style and most important, each other!!!
luvkat
item.content:encoded:
Congrats!
Congratulations lovebirds! You’ve got it all; love, youth, style and most important, each other!!!

luvkat

item.title: By: Anonymous

item.description: <strong>Love-Life</strong><br />I feel like a newly Wed at 48 years. I saw the tear and found one on my ckeek too.
item.content:encoded:
Love-Life
I feel like a newly Wed at 48 years. I saw the tear and found one on my ckeek too.

item.title: By: Anonymous
item.dc:creator: Anonymous
item.description: <strong>Happy Anniversary!</strong><br />You both are shiney stars, your beautiful, and your youth shines through! Stay young, be happy, and keep smiling! Bless you both! PS: Love the Hat! and that little off the shoulder dress ROCKS!:)
item.content:encoded:
Happy Anniversary!
You both are shiney stars, your beautiful, and your youth shines through! Stay young, be happy, and keep smiling! Bless you both! PS: Love the Hat! and that little off the shoulder dress ROCKS!:)

item.title: By: Anonymous
item.dc:creator: Anonymous
item.description: <strong>Happy anniversary</strong><br />Best wishes to both of you young folks.
item.content:encoded:
Happy anniversary
Best wishes to both of you young folks.

item.title: By: Anonymous
item.dc:creator: Anonymous
item.description:
<strong>Mazel Tov!</strong><br />You darling people, you are the role model of role models. You should give lessons. Maybe you do give lessons! A happy, healthy, celebratory day, year, month, lifetime.
Kim's friend Andrea
item.content:encoded:
Mazel Tov!
You darling people, you are the role model of role models. You should give lessons. Maybe you do give lessons!
A happy, healthy, celebratory day, year, month, lifetime.

Kim’s friend Andrea

item.title: By: Anonymous
item.dc:creator: Anonymous
item.description:
<strong>Happy 70th</strong><br />Dear Barbara and Harry,
Thanks for creating such a great example, and for gracing the Esotouric tours with your presence! And remember, the real fun comes at the 75th!
John Toomey
item.content:encoded:
Happy 70th
Dear Barbara and Harry,

Thanks for creating such a great example, and for gracing the Esotouric tours with your presence! And remember, the real fun comes at the 75th!

John Toomey

Frenchy but chic!

Happy Anniversary!

item.title: By: Anonymous
item.dc:creator: Anonymous
item.description: <strong>HAPPY 70TH ANNIVERSARY</strong><br />Dear Barbara and Harry, We just celebrated our 50th anniversary. We have a long way to go to catch up to the two of you. We have met Barbara and look forward to meeting Harry soon. We will continue to share conversations at the lunch and dinner at Hollenbeck Palms. Allon and Mary Schoener
item.content:encoded:
HAPPY 70TH ANNIVERSARY
Dear Barbara and Harry,
We just celebrated our 50th anniversary. We have a long way to go to catch up to the two of
you. We have met Barbara and look forward to meeting Harry soon. We will continue to share
conversations at the lunch and dinner at Hollenbeck Palms.
Allon and Mary Schoener

item.title: By: Anonymous
item.dc:creator: Anonymous
item.description:
<strong>Hey you kooky kidz!</strong><br />Blessings on you both from your favorite shikker yidde! A big gesunt on y'all at this great simcha. Have a spirited day!
Your li'l comrade, Nathan
item.content:encoded:
